IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: IMPACT ON EDUCATION (IOE) LEVERAGES COMMUNITY RESOURCES TO INCREASE ACHIEVEMENT, EQUITY AND COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT AND SUPPORT FOR PUBLIC EDUCATION IN BOULDER VALLEY. THE THREE FOCUS AREAS CREATE OPPORTUNITIES FOR "AT-RISK" STUDENTS; INCREASING STUDENT INTEREST AND ACHIEVEMENT IN SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND MATH; AND PROMOTING AND REWARDING TEACHER EXCELLENCE.IMPACT ON EDUCATION SUPPORTS AND MOTIVATES TEACHER EXCELLENCE BY PROVIDING TEACHERS WITH FUNDS FOR CREATIVE, HANDS-ON CLASSROOM PROJECTS THROUGH THE CLASSROOM MINI-GRANTS PROGRAM. IOE ALSO PROMOTES AND RECOGNIZES TEACHER EXCELLENCE BY ANNUALLY RECOGNIZING AND HONORING FIVE EDUCATORS AT A DINNER AND PROVIDES AWARDS TO THE EDUCATOR AND HIS/HER SCHOOL.OPPORTUNITIES FOR AT-RISK STUDENTS PROGRAM FOCUSES ON CREATING ACADEMIC AND EXTRACURRICULAR OPPORTUNITIES, REDUCING STUDENT DROPOUT AND POSITIVELY IMPACTING THE ACHIEVEMENT GAP BY PROVIDING SUPPORT TO AT-RISK STUDENTS FROM LOW-INCOME HOES. COLLABORATIONS WITH DISTRICT COORDINATORS, LOCAL YOUT
IRS990.MissionDescription: IMPACT ON EDUCATION (IOE) LEVERAGES COMMUNITY RESOURCES TO INCREASE ACHIEVEMENT, EQUITY AND COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT AND SUPPORT FOR PUBLIC EDUCATION IN BOULDER VALLEY. THE THREE FOCUS AREAS CREATE OPPORTUNITIES FOR "AT-RISK" STUDENTS; INCREASING STUDENT INTEREST AND ACHIEVEMENT IN SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND MATH; AND PROMOTING AND REWARDING TEACHER EXCELLENCE.IMPACT ON EDUCATION SUPPORTS AND MOTIVATES TEACHER EXCELLENCE BY PROVIDING TEACHERS WITH FUNDS FOR CREATIVE, HANDS-ON CLASSROOM PROJECTS THROUGH THE CLASSROOM MINI-GRANTS PROGRAM. IOE ALSO PROMOTES AND RECOGNIZES TEACHER EXCELLENCE BY ANNUALLY RECOGNIZING AND HONORING FIVE EDUCATORS AT A DINNER AND PROVIDES AWARDS TO THE EDUCATOR AND HIS/HER SCHOOL.OPPORTUNITIES FOR AT-RISK STUDENTS PROGRAM FOCUSES ON CREATING ACADEMIC AND EXTRACURRICULAR OPPORTUNITIES, REDUCING STUDENT DROPOUT AND POSITIVELY IMPACTING THE ACHIEVEMENT GAP BY PROVIDING SUPPORT TO AT-RISK STUDENTS FROM LOW-INCOME HOES. COLLABORATIONS WITH DISTRICT COORDINATORS, LOCAL YOUT
IRS990.Description: CRAYONS TO CALCULATORS PROVIDING STUDENTS IN NEED WITH BASIC SCHOOL SUPPLIES

Activity3.Description: OPPORTUNITY FUND ALLOWS BVSD STUDENTS TO ACCESS ACADEMIC, EXTRACURRICULAR AND ENRICHMENT OPPORTUNITIES THAT REQUIRE PARTICIPATION FEES, REGARDLESS OF THEIR FAMILY'S ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR THE SCHOOL THEY ATTEND.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part XIII, Line 2d: Other expenses and losses per audited F/S

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES ACCESS TO GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE CONDUCTS AN ANNUAL EVALUATION AND REVIEW OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S PERFORMANCE. OTHER STAFF MEMBERS ARE EVALUATED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION PERIODICALLY REVIEWS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY TO DETERMINE THAT ALL OF THE RECOMMENDED PROCEDURES ARE BEING FOLLOWED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS FORM 990 AND COMPARES IT TO THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS BEFORE THE RETURN IS FILED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part III, Line 4d : Other Program Services Description
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 4: IMPACT AWARDS - TEACHERS WHO MAKE OUTSTANDING DIFFERENCE FOR STUDENTS IN THE BOULDER VALLEY SCHOOL DISTRICT. TO BE USED IN A PROGRAM THAT DIRECTLY BENEFITS STUDENTS. OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 5: SMYTH SCHOLARSHIP OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 6: ODD FELLOWS SCHOLARSHIP OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 7: BESSOL SCHOLARSHIP OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 8: MISCELLANEOUS OTHER GRANTS/SCHOLARSHIPS OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 9: OPPORTUNITY FUND ALLOWS BVSD STUDENTS TO ACCESS ACADEMIC, EXTRACURRICULAR AND ENRICHMENT OPPORTUNITIES THAT REQUIRE PARTICIPATION FEES, REGARDLESS OF THEIR FAMILY'S ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR THE SCHOOL THEY ATTEND. OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 10: VARIOUS - PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 11: DONNA WISE SCHOLARSHIP OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 12: GOULD-FOOTHILL SCHOLARSHIP OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 13: CRAYONS TO CALCULATORS PROVIDING STUDENTS IN NEED WITH BASIC SCHOOL SUPPLIES OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 14: AMGEN LIFE SCIENCES PROGRAM - SUPPORTS DEVELOPMENT OF INQUIRY-BASED LIFE SCIENCE CURRICULUM AND MATERIALS BY SCIENCE TEACHERS TO SEVENTH GRADERS. OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 15: HEALTHY SCHOOL FOOD PROGRAM
